thread.title: Selena Gomez Gave The Weeknd a Quiet Shoutout Via Her Mom's Instagram Account - Selena Gomez Wears The Weeknd's Merch on Instagram
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez Gave The Weeknd a Quiet Shoutout Via Her Mom's Instagram Account - Selena Gomez Wears The Weeknd's Merch on Instagram

author: Kayleigh Roberts
title: Selena Gomez Gave The Weeknd a Quiet Shoutout Via Her Mom's Instagram Account - Selena Gomez Wears The Weeknd's Merch on Instagram
text:
Selena Gomez just gave her rumored boyfriend, The Weeknd (whose real name is Abel Tesfaye) a social media shoutout, but in a carefully subtle kind of way. In a picture posted to her mom, Mandy Teefey's Kicked to the Curb Productions Instagram, Selena posed in some of The Weeknd's merch.
Family Game night!! I love them all even though they almost beat me up...@selenagomez "date" for the night was two hours late so he missed group photo @rayhughesla! NO THEY ARE NOT REALLY DATING. @iamemilydawn @wipeyoownass @lh7management @stephaniehail
A post shared by Kicked to the Curb Productions (@kicked2thecurbproductions) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:57am PST
 You can barely see Selena's shirt in the picture, but that didn't stop fans from spotting the nod pretty much immediately.
#INFO : Selena Gomez porte la merch de The Weeknd sur sa dernière photo Instagram pic.twitter.com/IzPYSULdKp
— The Weeknd France (@thewkndFR) February 19, 2017
"Family Game night!! I love them all even though they almost beat me up...@selenagomez "date" for the night was two hours late so he missed group photo @rayhughesla! NO THEY ARE NOT REALLY DATING," Teefey captioned the Instagram picture.
Sure, it's not enough to call Selena and The Weeknd "Instagram official," but we'll take what we can get.
From: Marie Claire
